    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityParameterizedFilteringApplication.ParameterizedTaskQueryDefinition

        public EntityParameterizedFilteringApplication.ParameterizedTaskQueryDefinition(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                                                                        boolean applicationManagedTransactions,
                                                                        int batchSize)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        entityManager - the entityManager that gives us access to the database and cache
        applicationManagedTransactions - false if running in a J2EE container that provides the entityManager used, true otherwise
        batchSize - how many tuples to retrieve at once.

    • Method Detail

      • defineQuery

        protected javax.persistence.criteria.Root<?> defineQuery(javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder cb,
                                             javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery<?> cq)
        Define SELECT, FROM and WHERE clauses In this example, a CriteriaBuilder.parameter(Class) is used to define a parameter place holder. The method setParameters(TypedQuery) is overridden to provide the values.
        Overrides:
        defineQuery in class CriteriaQueryDefinition<Task>
        Parameters:
        cb - the CriteriaBuilder used to define the from, where and select
        cq - the CriteriaQuery to build the tuples,
        Returns:
        a root of the query (used for counting the lines returned)
        See Also:
        BeanTupleQueryDefinition.defineQuery(javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaBuilder, javax.persistence.criteria.CriteriaQuery)

      • setParameters

        public javax.persistence.TypedQuery<?> setParameters(javax.persistence.TypedQuery<?> tq)
        Set values for all parameters used in the predicates. Is expected to call super() to handle named parameters defined through AbstractCriteriaQueryDefinition.setNamedParameterValues(java.util.Map). In this example, there is only one parameter used in defineQuery and we set it directly.
        Overrides:
        setParameters in class AbstractCriteriaQueryDefinition<javax.persistence.Tuple>
        Parameters:
        tq - the runnable query that needs to have its parameter set
        Returns:
        the query after its parameters have been set.
